member.name: M:SocketClient.ConnectPage.OnNavigatedTo(Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when this page is about to be displayed in a Frame.
member.param: Event data that describes how this page was reached. This parameter is typically used to configure the page.

member.name: M:SocketClient.App.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the singleton application object. This is the first line of authored code executed, and as such is the logical equivalent of main() or WinMain().

member.name: M:SocketClient.App.OnLaunched(Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LaunchActivatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the application is launched normally by the end user. Other entry points will be used when the application is launched to open a specific file, to display search results, and so forth.
member.param: Details about the launch request and process.

member.name: M:SocketClient.App.RootFrame_FirstNavigated(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Restores the content transitions after the app has launched.

member.name: M:SocketClient.App.OnSuspending(System.Object,Windows.ApplicationModel.SuspendingEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when application execution is being suspended.Application state is saved without knowing whether the application will be terminated or resumed with the contents of memory still intact.

member.name: T:SocketClient.App
member.summary: Provides application-specific behavior to supplement the default Application class.
